title: Matthew Lavallee
text:
About
I am PhD student at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, training to become a health economist. My research interests include Medicaid, the social safety net, and how programs interact. Before graduate school, I worked as a Tobin Center / Economics Pre-Doctoral Fellow researching access to care and quality of care in Medicaid, and how social programs shape care for Medicaid enrollees.


Education
      Hampshire College - Amherst, Massachusetts
            BA in Economics & Mathematics, 2020
      Johns Hopkins University - Baltimore, Maryland
            PhD in Health Economics & Policy, 2027 (expected)
